sentences.en: a badly broken leg
sentences.cn: 严重骨折的腿

sentences.en: Carl Lewis has broken the world record in the 100 metres.
sentences.cn: 卡尔·刘易斯已经打破了百米赛跑的世界纪录。

sentences.en: Do you know how the phone got broken (=  became broken  ) ?
sentences.cn: 你知道电话是怎么坏掉的吗？

sentences.en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentences.cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentences.en: Gibbs had an X-ray, which revealed no broken bones.
sentences.cn: 吉布斯拍了X光片，显示没有骨折。

sentences.en: He has a broken nose but may be discharged today.
sentences.cn: 他鼻梁断了，但或许今天就能出院。

sentences.en: His jaw was broken after he was hit on the head.
sentences.cn: 他的头部受重击之后下颌骨折了。

sentences.en: Hospital discipline was broken. Amy would have to explain herself.
sentences.cn: 破坏了医院的纪律，埃米将不得不为自己辩解。

sentences.en: If a window is broken, you can't stick it back together again.
sentences.cn: 如果窗户碎了，就无法再把它粘回到一起了。

sentences.en: Is there an alternative to traction for a broken leg?
sentences.cn: 对于腿部骨折有什么方法替代牵引治疗吗？

sentences.en: Mind the broken glass.
sentences.cn: 当心碎玻璃。

sentences.en: Spencer waded through the debris of broken chairs and beer bottles.
sentences.cn: 斯潘塞艰难地迈过一堆破椅子和碎啤酒瓶。

sentences.en: The Aussie was in agony with a broken finger.
sentences.cn: 这个澳大利亚人承受着断指之痛。

sentences.en: The CD player’s broken again.
sentences.cn: 激光唱机又坏了。

sentences.en: The landscape is broken only by a string of villages.
sentences.cn: 这片风景中只有一排村庄。

sentences.en: The silence was broken by the whirring of a helicopter.
sentences.cn: 直升机的嗡嗡声打破了沉寂。

sentences.en: The stillness of night was broken by the boom of a cannon.
sentences.cn: 夜晚的寂静被隆隆的炮声打破。

sentences.en: The unearthly silence was broken by a shrill screaming.
sentences.cn: 一声尖叫打破了这可怕的沉寂。

sentences.en: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, many are stronger at the broken places.
sentences.cn: 生活总是让我们遍体鳞伤，但到后来，那些受伤的地方会变得更坚强。

sentences.en: They've torn down wooden fences and broken branches off trees.
sentences.cn: 他们拆掉了木栅栏，并砍去了一些树枝。

sentences.en: Wrap it up well so it doesn’t get broken (=  become broken  ) in the mail.
sentences.cn: 把它包装好，免得在邮寄过程中打碎。
